src:
Timnas Indonesia U-19 Termotivasi Mengarungi Kualifikasi Piala AFC 2020
05 Nov 2019, 17:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-19 akan memulai kiprahnya di Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. Lawan pertama yang bakal dihadapi ialah Timor Leste U-19 di Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Sehari jelang laga, pelatih Timnas Indonesia U-19, Fakhri Husaini mengungkapkan kesiapan timnya untuk laga tersebut. Dia juga menegaskan bahwa pasukannya sangat menantikan event dua tahunan itu.
"Pertama kami dari Timnas Indonesia U-19 menyampaikan bahwa semua pemain sudah sangat siap bertanding pada laga pertama besok. Mereka sangat termotivasi, sangat antusias," ujar Fakhri saat sesi konferensi pers di Hotel Atlet Century, Senayan, Jakarta.
"Ya syukur alhamdulillah sampai persiapan terakhir 22 pemain dalam kondisi sehat, siap untuk bermain semaksimal mungkin," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Indonesian U-19 national team motivated to navigate the AFC Cup 2020 qualifiers
05 Nov 2019, 17:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian U-19 national team will begin its work in the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup. The first opponent that will be faced is Timor Leste U-19 at Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
A day before the match, U-19 Indonesian national team coach Fakhri Husaini revealed his team's readiness for the match. He also stressed that his troops were looking forward to the biennial event.
"First of all, we from the Indonesian National Team U-19 said that all players are very ready to compete in the first match tomorrow. They are very motivated, very enthusiastic," Fakhri said during a press conference session at the Century Athlete Hotel, Senayan, Jakarta.
"Thank God, until the final preparation, 22 players are in good health, ready to play as much as possible," he added.
